Name: FREE ON BOARD
Description: The supplier is responsible for delivering the goods on board the vessel at the port of shipment. The buyer takes responsibility from that point, including transportation and insurance.

Name: FREE CARRIER
Description: The supplier delivers the goods to the carrier or another nominated person at the agreed location. The buyer is responsible for all risks and costs from that point onward.

Name: FREE ALONGSIDE SHIP
Description: The supplier is responsible for delivering the goods alongside the vessel at the port of shipment. The buyer assumes all risks and costs from that point.

Name: EX WORKS
Description: The supplier is responsible for making the goods available at their premises. The buyer bears all risks and costs from that point onward, including transportation and insurance.

Name: DELIVERED EX SHIP
Description: The supplier is responsible for delivering the goods to the port of destination. The buyer is responsible for unloading, duties, and onward transportation.

Name: DELIVERED EX QUAY
Description: The supplier is responsible for delivering the goods at the quay (wharf) of the destination port. The buyer assumes all costs and risks from that point.

Name: DELIVERED DUTY UNPAID
Description: The supplier delivers the goods to the agreed destination but does not cover import duties or taxes. The buyer is responsible for those costs.

Name: DELIVERED DUTY PAID
Description: The supplier is responsible for delivering the goods to the agreed destination, including import duties and taxes. The buyer assumes responsibility only after delivery.

Name: DELIVERED AT TERMINAL
Description: The supplier delivers the goods to a terminal at the named destination. The buyer is responsible for all risks and costs after the goods are unloaded at the terminal.

Name: DELIVERED AT PLACE
Description: The supplier delivers the goods to the agreed destination. The buyer is responsible for unloading and assumes all risks and costs thereafter.

Name: DELIVERED AT FRONTIER
Description: The supplier delivers the goods to the frontier, before the customs border of the destination country. The buyer is responsible for customs clearance and onward delivery.

Name: COST INSURANCE AND FREIGHT
Description: The supplier is responsible for the cost of goods, insurance, and freight to the destination port. The buyer assumes responsibility for unloading and import clearance.

Name: COST AND FREIGHT
Description: The supplier is responsible for the cost of goods and freight to the destination port. The buyer assumes risk once the goods are loaded on the vessel.

Name: CARRIAGE PAID TO
Description: The supplier pays for carriage to the named destination. The buyer assumes the risk once the goods are handed over to the first carrier.

Name: CARRIAGE AND INSURANCE PAID TO
Description: The supplier pays for carriage and insurance to the named destination. The buyer assumes risk after the goods are handed over to the first carrier.
